modules.description: Provides functions to compute hash values for user-defined types using a custom or default hashing strategy. Works with OCaml's native type system, including records, variants, and polymorphic types. Enables precise control over hashing behavior through attributes, allowing override of default hash functions for specific types.

Generates hash functions for OCaml types using custom syntax extensions, handling variants, records, tuples, and polymorphic variants through expression-building utilities. Operates on OCaml AST nodes, type declarations, and core types to produce hash computation code. Used to automatically implement hash functions for custom data types in generated code.
